answerText: Romilayu[10] Romilayu is a character in this novel in which the title millionaire travels to Africa and lifts a statue of Mummah to earn the titular epithet.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Illinois A, Alabama, Yale B | 18 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this guide who leads a title character to the village of the Arnewi before traveling to the village of the Wariri.
